Name: KAWAII SLIME ARENA
About the game: KAWAII SLIME ARENA is an action first person shooter with RPG elements and lots of upgrades. Help Yui defeat the slimes with powerful weapons! Choose between lots of upgrades to make her stronger and beat the arenas to unlock all weapons!
